title: i paid 3145 in a free game, that can explain  how i love this game , but  , lol  u let down

embed.description: ïuv mmmmmmmmmmm / Diamond 4 0LP / 342W 343L Win Ratio 50% / Kha'Zix - 88W 70L Win Ratio 56%, Diana - 90W 67L Win Ratio 57%, LeBlanc - 28W 21L Win Ratio 57%, Ahri - 26W 17L Win Ratio 60%, Caitlyn - 13W 15L Win Ratio 46%

body:
You are going to: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VjzgbZL12VI


i feelling same to this guy ,

i made like 15 ticket

but u guys never read my ticket

my english is bad ,

but i aawys try my best to making ticket

same to i aways try my best playing my game

i aways respect everyoen

but,

lol 

-----------

in my last game

my teammates doing nothing, and trash talk to me  when theirs twtich comp me ,

they just give up and blaming me  

try to making me angry and then ask for reports

how bad it is ?

how can i playing this game if i getting ban for my last game?

can u see my chats?

i just said idiot  and i will feed,

but  did i?

i never feed any single game

last game my damage is best

our jg and top no damage

because they are typing all game

....
riot  u are let me down

i will never play this motherfucking game once

i paid too much time and money 

time to say cya ,


i gonna playPUBG   

bye bye  lol

replies.body:
